Reviews.Title: Ok camera
Reviews.Author: Sd
Reviews.Content: Dont buy swan recorder. They freeze up all the time, The remote is cheap and you have to hold it 10" away for it to do anything and the recorder won't play back.  The camera is good, I have 3 and they work good.

Reviews.Title: Very good quality
Reviews.Author: Yoshio Shimada
Reviews.Content: The image is very clear and useful and I am satisfied with the product 100%.  It is very nice design too.

Reviews.Title: Best all around camera
Reviews.Author: nocturnal1
Reviews.Content: Viewing angle is its only down fall. I got it only because it was on sale ($75) and it fits nicely within my 4 camera DVR. Night vision is good, but not stellar. When a cheaper camera fails I would consider buying one of these to replace. I have bought Swann products in the past. I know I am reviewing this product only but you can not go wrong with Swann as long as your expectations don't exceed your needs. You get what you pay for...
